body:
Backport DCMTK 3.6.4 changes
https://github.com/DCMTK/dcmtk/commits/master/ofstd/include/dcmtk/ofstd/variadic/helpers.h

- Re-fixed the clang conversion issue from yesterday.
- Fixed a compile time type conversion issue on clang.

These changes are already merged after 3.6.4. 
So I added `self.spec.satisfies('@:3.6.3')`
title: dcmtk: fixed type error
